title: Bugged Summoner's Icon
body:
Hi, i got this Summoner's Icon bugged to the starter one, is happen only to me ? What can i do to fix this ?
I tried change icon for days , to unistall and repair client but nothing changed.

*

replies.body: This is actually a known issue for a lot of players at the moment, where everyone's summoner icon in the lobby appears as the default.  No eta, but we'll be working towards a fix.  Thanks for the heads up!
